comments:
2.0 + UI HEAD stream.
Create a java project
Create a java class (clicking in the boolbar).

Will get the following NPE

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.TitleAreaDialog.updateMessage
(TitleAreaDialog.java:520)
	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.TitleAreaDialog.showMessage
(TitleAreaDialog.java:505)
	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.TitleAreaDialog.setMessage
(TitleAreaDialog.java:488)
	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.TitleAreaDialog.setMessage
(TitleAreaDialog.java:447)
	at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.updateMessage
(WizardDialog.java:1006)
	at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardPage.setMessage(WizardPage.java:246)
	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.DialogPage.setMessage(DialogPage.java:348)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.dialogs.StatusUtil.applyToStatusLine
(StatusUtil.java:70)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.ui.wizards.NewElementWizardPage.updateStatus
(NewElementWizardPage.java:69)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.ui.wizards.NewElementWizardPage.setVisible
(NewElementWizardPage.java:57)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.ui.wizards.NewClassWizardPage.setVisible
(NewClassWizardPage.java:177)
	at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.showStartingPage
(WizardDialog.java:912)
	at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.createContents
(WizardDialog.java:459)
	at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.create(Window.java:277)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.wizards.AbstractOpenWizardAction.run
(AbstractOpenWizardAction.java:150)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.wizards.AbstractOpenWizardAction.run
(AbstractOpenWizardAction.java:170)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.PluginAction.runWithEvent
(PluginAction.java:210)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.WWinPluginAction.runWithEvent
(WWinPluginAction.java:175)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.handleWidgetSelection
(ActionContributionItem.java:407)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.handleWidgetEvent
(ActionContributionItem.java:361)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.access$0
(ActionContributionItem.java:352)
	at 
org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem$ActionListener.handleEvent
(ActionContributionItem.java:47)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java
(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:827)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java
(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java
(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java
(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.run(Workbench.java:1179)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run
(InternalBootLoader.java:775)
	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:432)
	at EclipseRuntimeLauncher.main(EclipseRuntimeLauncher.java:24)

This was due to JDT setting the message in the dialog to null. This is 
permitted in the API so null handling has been added.
*** Bug 22012 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
